column4: can anybody tell me where the files are that make up my panel? like custom launchers and menu items and stuff?
I have a lost of custom launchers and would like to be able to just copy them whenever I reinstall the OS
can anybody tell me where the files are that make up my panel? like custom launchers and menu items and stuff?
custom launchers are in ~/.gnome2/panel2.d/default/launchers/, menu entries in ~/.local/share/applications
